title: Social and Financial Leadership Competency Enhancement Program for University Students

context.prior_knowledge: General comprehension of basic social structures and financial systems
context.additional_context: Student-led project-based learning and utilization of online collaboration tools

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain leadership models that integrate social responsibility and financial decision-making capabilities.
Learners can propose financial resource allocation strategies through simulations using real-world cases.
Learners can apply diversity respect and conflict management skills through team-based problem-solving activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
